response.overview: The Essentials follows a group of young people living in a city sustained by the balance between different clans and elemental forces. When inexplicable disturbances begin to occur, threatening the stability of the world they know, they are forced to assume responsibilities for which they were unprepared. As they try to maintain peace and prevent a larger conflict, they discover that the order protecting the city is tied to decisions made in the past and powers they don't yet fully understand. Amid tensions, fragile alliances, and revelations, they must decide whether to preserve the existing system… or face the consequences of changing it.
response.title: The Essentials
